newsitem.title: USA: U.S. Dec T-bond finishes down, near session low.
newsitem.headline: U.S. Dec T-bond finishes down, near session low.

text.p: Oct 22 - U.S. Dec T-bonds extended losses late to hit a fresh session low of 110-19/32, ending near that low. Redbook Retail Sales Index reported up 0.8 percent in first two weeks in Oct versus Sept. Selling from Wall Street firms hit the market in the last 15 minutes to take it to the lows, traders said. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
